QuestData.Title: To Orgrimmar
QuestData.Description: A darkness in me mind be keeping me from remembering what happened da day I named Sylvanas warchief.$b$bTake me glaive and travel to da pyre where I was cremated in Orgrimmar.$b$bMaster Gadrin be packin' enough juju to call me to dat place.$b$bGo, and I be seein' ya dere.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Glaive of Vol'jin to Master Gadrin at Drannosh'ar Blockade, Durotar.
